summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated June 22, 2020, with an attached spreadsheet titled 'EpsteinNYEvidence.xlsx'. The email appears to be part of evidence sharing or communication related to the Epstein case in New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified by their official title, who is sharing evidence related to the Epstein case from the Southern District of New York.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York sent an email on June 22, 2020.
The email includes an attachment named 'EpsteinNYEvidence.xlsx', suggesting it contains evidence related to the Epstein case.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office at 1 St. Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
